channel.title: Naruto Shippuden: Ultimate Ninja Storm 3 Full Blast
channel.description:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3wFnn2FBakk I know it's a DLC, but it's quite the annoucment considering you get to be Sage Kabuto, you also you get all of the DLC costumes that were released previously. I guess the price determines whether I am going to pay for what should have already been in the game or not, I will guess 1200msp, $20.
But from this I am guessing that the anime/manga is coming to an end. I mean if they were going to release another game then they would do so next year but by the the anime/manga would have finished or past this part so I guess they're pushing out games for people to buy before it ends, in other words you're buying the story early. More money for them I guess.
Oh, and no Edu Kages. [size=1pt]that we know of[/size]

item.title: Naruto Shippuden: Ultimate Ninja Storm 3 Full Blast
item.dc:creator: @kingman002 kingman002
item.description:
@kingman002 wrote:

I got the Goku Naruto already and stuff from preorder, but no edu kage? Damnit.

I’m interested in seeing all of the new DLC costumes though

Read full topic
item.source: Naruto Shippuden: Ultimate Ninja Storm 3 Full Blast
